name: Run Run Robot 3: Mirror Mayhem
description:
Run Run Robot 3: Mirror Mayhem is a twist on the classic endless runner! Guide the Robot and his doppleganger to safety as they jump and roll through an endless landscape avoiding all manner of hazards such as lava and spikes!

Bash the ground enemies who get in the Robots' way, and bounce on flying enemies to reach higher platforms! Grab the power-ups to temporarily boost the Robots' abilities, and collect as many coins as you can muster for extra kudos!

GAMEPLAY

Run Run Robot 3: Mirror Mayhem is deceptively easy to play! Tap the right side of the screen to jump, and tap the left side of the screen to roll. Time your jumps carefully to navigate the precariously-placed platforms, and use the rollerball to smash through bashable crates, rocks, and enemies. Be sure to grab the hearts and power-ups along the way to boost the Robots' abilities!

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screens within the game.

FEATURES

  • A fantastically fast and furious endless runner!
  • Four power-ups to enhance your abilities!
  • A massive endlessly scrolling landscape to master!
  • Colorful cartoon characters and environments!
  • Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
  • Bright and bubbly background tunes!
  • Suitable for players of all ages!
